.header-items #nav-actions i{cursor:pointer;transition:all .7s ease-in-out}.header .header-items #nav-actions i:hover{color:#caad8c}.header .header-items #nav-actions i:nth-child(2){margin-left:10px}.header .header-items #nav-actions .nav-toggler{width:30px;height:25px;cursor:pointer;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;margin-left:20px}#hero-main{padding-top:30px}.hero .hero-contents .hero-heading{font-size:45px}.hero .hero-contents .hero-copy{font-size:18px}.hero .hero-contents .hero-btn a{font-size:16px}.hero .hero-img-container{width:100%}.products{padding:0 35px;align-items:center}.products .products-number{font-size:55px}.products .products-number span{margin-top:-10px;font-size:20px}.products .products-brands img{width:120px;cursor:pointer}.products .products-brands img:not(:last-child){margin-right:30px}@keyframes slide{0%{transform:translateX(0)}50%{transform:translateX(-65%)}to{transform:translateX(0)}}.products-desc{padding:0 35px}.products-desc .products-desc-container{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-contents{text-align:center;width:100%}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-contents .products-desc-heading{font-size:40px}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-contents .products-desc-copy{font-size:20px;margin:12px 0}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-contents .products-desc-btn a{font-size:16px}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-contents .products-desc-btn a span{margin-left:10px}.products-desc .products-desc-container .products-desc-img{width:350px;margin-top:-30px}.products-desc .products-shelf{flex-direction:row-reverse;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;margin-top:25px}.products-desc .products-shelf .products-desc-img{width:230px;margin-right:0;margin-top:30px}#products-display .products-display-heading{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;text-align:center}#products-display .products-display-heading h4{font-size:40px;margin-bottom:20px}#products-display .products-display-heading p{background:#caad8c;padding:2px 5px;border-radius:5px;transition:all .7s ease-in-out}#products-display .products-display-heading p:hover{color:#14120f;transform:scale(1.2)}#products-display .products-display-heading p a{pointer-events:none}#products-display .products-display-imgs{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr));width:100%;row-gap:25px}#products-display .products-display-imgs .products-display-img{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}#products-display .products-display-imgs .products-display-img .interior-right{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column}.interior-container .interior-right .interior-copy h4{font-size:40px}.interior-container .interior-right .interior-copy p{font-size:20px;margin:15px 0}.interior-container .interior-right .interior-right-img{margin-left:0}#testimonials{padding:40px 0}.testimonial-container h4{font-size:40px;text-align:center}.testimonials{position:relative;height:250px;width:100%;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.testimonials .testimonial{position:absolute;padding:30px 10px;width:60%;margin:0 auto;transform:scale(0);transition:all 2.2s cubic-bezier(.2,.5,.2,1)}.testimonials .testimonial.active{transform:scale(1);width:80%;z-index:4}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-img:before{width:30px;height:30px}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-img img{width:40px}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-content{font-size:18px}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-person .person-img{margin-right:10px;width:50px}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-person .person-details h5{font-size:18px}.testimonials .testimonial .testimonial-person .person-details p{font-size:12px}.slider-pointers{width:60px;height:50px;margin:50px auto 0;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-direction:row}.slider-pointers .pointer{width:15px;height:15px;border-radius:50%;border:1px solid #623b1c;transition:all 1s ease-in-out;cursor:pointer}.slider-pointers .pointer.active{background:#623b1c}.slider-btns{margin-top:10px}#newsletter{padding:0 30px}.newsletter-container{width:100%}.newsletter-container button{width:100%;margin-left:0;margin-top:10px}footer{padding:50px .footer-texts{width:100%}.top-footer .footer-right{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);grid-gap:auto;margin-top:50px;width:100%}.top-footer .footer-right .footer-contact,.top-footer .footer-right .footer-discover{margin-top:25px}.top-footer .footer-right .footer-item:not(:last-child){margin-right:0}.bottom-footer{margin-top:70px}.bottom-footer .media i:not(:last-child){margin-right:10px}}@media screen and (max-width:420px){@keyframes slide{0%{transform:translateX(0)}50%{transform:translateX(-100vw)}to{transform:translateX(0)}}#products-display .products-display-imgs{margin-top:20px;grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);grid-gap:10px}#products-display .products-display-imgs .fourth,#products-display .products-display-imgs
